text: Gema Peris Revert (born 20 April 1983 in Valencia) was a Spanish female weightlifter, competing in the 48 kg category and representing Spain at international competitions. She participated at the 2004 Summer Olympics in the 48 kg event. She competed at world championships, most recently at the 2007 World Weightlifting Championships. ==Major results== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" ! rowspan=2 width=40 | Year ! rowspan=2 width=250 | Venue !
